works.title: Video games App
works.description: A Full Stack Web Application dedicated to video games, allows users to explore and discover information about various video games through an intuitive UI.
works.techs: Javascript, React, Redux, Css, Node.js, Express, Sequelize

works.title: TicketShow
works.description: This is a ticket-selling application for events that features payment gateway integration, local and third-party authentication, combined filters, a review/rating system, and an administration dashboard. The application was created to support emerging artists in promoting their events.
works.techs: Javascript, React, Redux, Tailwind, Node.js, Express, Sequelize, Figma, Firebase

works.title: Rick & Morty App
works.description: The Rick and Morty app is a user-friendly platform that enables fans of the series to explore various details about the show's characters and locations. With an intuitive interface, users can effortlessly navigate through the app and discover interesting facts about their favorite characters.
works.techs: Javascript, React, Redux, Css, Node.js, Express, Sequelize

works.title: The Weather App
works.description: I created a weather app for any city in the world. Highly recommended in the front-end community, I was intrigued and took up the challenge. Here's the final product.
